ygData.subject: Blackened Iron Bastard Sword?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya all! I m lookin for some info (*spoil* me, PLEASE!) on the BIBS.  I know its in Runneyeye, but was looking for more specifics on the location, the MOB
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya all!
I'm lookin for some info (*spoil* me, PLEASE!) on the BIBS. I know its in
Runneyeye, but was looking for more specifics on the location, the MOB that
carries it, group lvl needed to get to / obtain the sword, etc, etc. I
haven't spent much time in Runneyeye...is it a good mid-level dungeon? it
doesn't seem very crowded..which would be a NICE change after spending the
last week in Unrest!
Also, for those of you wise in the way of Runneyeye...what MOBs drop the
Blackened Iron armor pieces? I know the AC isn't great, and it weighs a
lot, but it looks very cool and I bet there is a market out there for that
'look'.
Thanks in advance for your help!!
Thoradin of Bristlebane
